6873248b615c003311ebb292 description: "Yo, merc, got a weird one for ya. Some high-roller client of mine’s got a hard-on for his old-school stuff, and he’s paying big to get it back. He’s after some old game console and a bootleg Star Wars DVD he stashed somewhere in the Health Resort on Shoreline. Problem is, I was three vodkas deep when he told me the room number, so I got no clue where exactly. You’ll need to sniff around the resort’s fancy suites y’know, the ones with the plush carpets and overpriced views. Once you’ve nabbed the goods, drop ‘em off at the mini theater in Interchange, in the back somewhere by the poster he said. Don’t even think about popping that DVD in for a watch or selling it for a quick buck, don't try fucking with that  game console either. This guy’s obsessive, and I ain’t dealing with his tantrums. They're messy; do this clean, and we’ll talk more work."
6873248b615c003311ebb292 startedMessageT: Good Luck out there. Try not to die over this.
6873248b615c003311ebb292 successMessageT: Well, damn, merc, you actually pulled it off! Found that console and dvd, huh? Not bad for a glorified scavenger. Dropped ‘em off at the mini theater like I asked, too? My client’s gonna be over the moon, probably crying into his vintage popcorn. You’ve got some skills, operator. Stick around, nice to have someone that don't fuck up a simple fetch job. Now go clean your gear or something.
686fb59d8b0538a76b923998: Find the bootleg DVD at the Health Resort
687309c0742d221499ecb69e: Find the game console at the Health Resort
68730b8f645d8547cbf06740: Place the bootlegged DVD at the mini theater on Interchange
68730c98c6a9aafc1a8c2078: Place the game console at the mini theater on Interchange
